pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Binding Events + l // A free software for a fast and easy analysis of 1:1 molecular interaction studies. This package is suitable for a high-throughput data analysis. Both the online app and the package are completely open source. You provide a table of sensogram, tell 'anabel' which method to use, and it takes care of all fitting details. The first two releases of 'anabel' were created and implemented as in (doi:10.1177/1177932218821383, doi:10.1093/database/baz101).
